<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Storm Retribution](/Feats.aspx?ID=329) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 136 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[storm order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=3); [_tempest surge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=479) order spell

**Trigger**
An opponent adjacent to you critically hits you with a melee weapon or melee unarmed attack.

**Requirements**
You have at least 1 available Focus Point.

</column>

---

You lash out, directing a burst of storming fury toward a creature that has harmed you. You cast [_tempest surge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=479) on the triggering opponent and push that creature, moving it 5 feet away from you if it fails its Reflex save, or 10 feet if it critically fails. This movement is forced movement.
name: Storm Retribution
requirement: You have at least 1 available Focus Point.
